comments:
This is with I200311202030. I had previously done a binary import of all 
plugins so when I installed this new version I wanted to delete all those 
projects and re-import. In the Package Explorer I selected all of them, right 
clicked, and selected Delete, and selected the option to delete the content. 
During deletion, the Package Explorer window redrew itself again and and 
again - it looked like the CVS and binary decorations would disappear, then 
reappear, with a couple flashes where the screen was blank in between. I've 
reported that before so that's not new, but then it stopped with an error 
saying it could not delete a resource (I think it was in PDE core).

Although the dialog didn't mention an exception or the .log file, I noticed 
some new entries in the .log file which I've included below. Selecting and 
deleting the remaining resources worked ok the second time. Next I re-imported 
the plugins, which went fine except for more flashing and redrawing.

Contents of .metadata/.log:

!SESSION Nov 20, 2003 09:47:51.474 --------------------------------------------
